bibl.title: The Poem of Empedocles. A Text and Translation with an Introduction. Revised Edition. (Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 39 = The Phoenix Presocratics. 3.)
bibl.note: 1e éd.: Phoenix. Supplementary Volumes. 29, Toronto - Buffalo - London, 1992. - Integrates the new material from P. Stras. Inv. 1665-1666 [edd.: Alain MARTIN et Oliver PRIMAVESI, L'Empédocle de Strasbourg (Strasbourg - Berlin, 1999)] with the previously known evidence. - See in part. pp. 19-21: The Evidence of the Papyrus; - 75-79: The Impact of the Papyrus.
